EmailTemplate.name: CASE CREATED - EMAIL TO CUSTOMER_DE_EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Create new case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms.:
Many thanks for your inquiry about the Danfoss Customer Service Center. Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}. We are busy processing your inquiry and will respond as soon as possible.
You can check the status of your case by phone on +49 69 97533 044.
To do so, please have your case-number to hand .
Kind regards, Danfoss Customer Service Center {!Case.OwnerFullName}
*********Please Do Not Delete or Type below this Line********* {!Case.Thread_Id}
Important note! We have a new central phone number and e-mail address Phone: 069 97533 044 E-Mail: CS@danfoss.de
